source:
import selenium
import pandas as pd
from selenium import webdriver
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By
import time

product_urls=[]
start=0
end=3
for page in range(start,end):
    url=driver.find_elements(By.XPATH,'//a[@class="a-link-normal s-underline-text s-underline-link-text s-link-style a-text-normal"]')
    for i in url[0:10]:
        product_urls.append(i.get_attribute('href'))
    next_button=driver.find_element(By.XPATH,'//a[@class="s-pagination-item s-pagination-next s-pagination-button s-pagination-separator"]')
    next_button.click()
    time.sleep(2)

import pandas as pd
df=pd.DataFrame({'Brand Name':Brand,'Name of Product':Name,'Price':Price,'Return/Exchange':Return,'Expected Delivery':Delivery,'Availability':Availability,'Product URLS':urls})
df

product_urls=[]
start=0
end=1
for page in range(start,end):
    url=driver.find_elements(By.XPATH,'//a[@class="_1fQZEK"]')
    for i in url:
        product_urls.append(i.get_attribute('href'))
    time.sleep(2)

source:
Rank=[]
rank=driver.find_elements(By.XPATH,'//div[@class="rank"]')
for i in rank:
    ranks=i.text
    Rank.append(ranks)

Name=[]
name=driver.find_elements(By.XPATH,'//div[@class="personName"]')
for i in name:
    names=i.text
    Name.append(names)

Worth=[]
worth=driver.find_elements(By.XPATH,'//div[@class="netWorth"]')
for i in worth:
    nworth=i.text
    Worth.append(nworth)

Age=[]
age=driver.find_elements(By.XPATH,'//div[@class="age"]')
for i in age:
    ages=i.text
    Age.append(ages)

Citizen=[]
citizen=driver.find_elements(By.XPATH,'//div[@class="countryOfCitizenship"]')
for i in citizen:
    citizens=i.text
    Citizen.append(citizens)

Source=[]
source=driver.find_elements(By.XPATH,'//span[@class="source-text"]')
for i in source:
    sources=i.text
    Source.append(sources)

Industry=[]
industry=driver.find_elements(By.XPATH,'//div[@class="category"]')
for i in industry:
    industry1=i.text
    Industry.append(industry1)

Upvote=[]
upvote=driver.find_elements(By.XPATH,'//span[@id="vote-count-middle"]')
for i in upvote:
    upvotes=i.text
    Upvote.append(upvotes)

Time=[]
time=driver.find_elements(By.XPATH,'//yt-formatted-string[@class="published-time-text style-scope ytd-comment-renderer"]')
for i in time:
    times=i.text
    Time.append(times)
